property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ At the start of your turn, if you have a 'P.P.P.P' in the battle zone, mana zone and graveyard, you may reveal a 'P.P.P.P' in your hand. If you do, you win the game.

property.name: Rarity

property.value: DMR-22 The World of Zero!! Blackout!!

property.name: Race
property.value: Magic Command/Great Mecha King/Initials

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top card of your deck. If the cost of the card is odd, draw 5 cards. ■ When you would lose the game or your opponent would win the game, reveal the top card of your deck instead. If the cost of the card is odd, draw 5 cards. If the cost of the card is even, you lose the game. ■ If you have 10 or more cards in your hand, this creature gets +10000 power, "Quattro Breaker" and can't be blocked.

property.name: Race
property.value: Angel Command Dragon/Revolutionary/Team Doremi

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution Change: Light or Water Dragon that costs 5 or more {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may cast a light spell that costs 5 or less from your hand for no cost. If you don't, draw a card. ■ Final Revolution: When you put this creature with "Revolution Change" and you haven't used another "Final Revolution" during this turn, your opponent can't summon creatures that cost 7 or less until the end of your opponent's next turn.

property.value: Angel Command/Master Initials

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each card in your opponent's shield zone. It can't cost 0 or less. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ During your turn, whenever your opponent's creatures are tapped, if you have a D2 Field in the battle zone, that creature doesn't untap at the start of their turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. ■ If you don't have a D2 Field in the battle zone at the start of your turn, this creature doesn't untap. ■ Whenever this creature untaps, each of your creatures get +5000 power and breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} {REVOLUTION CHANGE}-Light or Nature dragoncosts 5 or more(When one of your Light or Nature dragonscosts 5 or moreattacks, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a D2 Field from your mana zone and put it into the battle zone. ■ If you have a D2 Field in the battle zone, nobody can put a D2 Field into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has less power than this creature. Then put a creature that has less power than this creature from your graveyard into the battle zone. ■ If you have a Forbidden Field in the battle zone, this creature gets +90000 power and has "triple breaker".

property.value: Demon Command Dragon/Master Initials/Team Acme

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} {REVOLUTION CHANGE}-Darkness or Fire Dragon (When one of your Darkness or Fire Dragons attacks, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand.) ■ When this creature is put into your graveyard from anywhere, if you have a D2 Field in the battle zone, return it to your hand.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.value: Mega Command Dragon/Revolutionary/Team Hamukatsu

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {REVOLUTION CHANGE}-Fire or Nature dragoncosts 5 or more(When one of your Fire or Nature dragonscosts 5 or moreattacks, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may choose a multicolored Dragon, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
